title: 'Louie' Hits Its Mark While 'The Comedians' Hasn't Yet Fully Succeeded
teaser: Louis C.K.'s comedy and the new mockumentary The Comedians start Thursday on the FX cable network. Both are unusual and ambitious, says critic David Bianculli, but only one hits the ground running.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
